annotation_sentence: Oh, hello! Um, my favorite holiday is, how to say... Spring Festival, yes!

annotation_sentence: Yes, yes! Chinese New Year. It is very, um, important. Big holiday.

annotation_sentence: Yes! Hongbao. Good for children, and sometimes adults too. For happiness.
